Label.en: Anyway, on that day, Henry IV was travelling in his carriage, but heavy traffic congested the road!
Label.fr: Ce jour là, Henry IV voyageait dans son carrosse, mais la rue était très embouteillée !
Label.es: Anyway, on that day, Henry IV was travelling in his carriage, but heavy traffic congested the road!
Label.zh: Anyway, on that day, Henry IV was travelling in his carriage, but heavy traffic congested the road!

Label.en: In the confusion, Ravaillac managed to storm the carriage and kill the king!
Label.fr: Dans la confusion, Ravaillac s'est débrouillé pour monter dans le carosse et poignarder le roi !
Label.es: In the confusion, Ravaillac managed to storm the carriage and kill the king!
Label.zh: In the confusion, Ravaillac managed to storm the carriage and kill the king!

Label.en: Really?! Just seeing it like that makes me scared... it must have been pandemonium!
Label.fr: Vraiment ?! Cela ressemble davantage au Pandémonium !
Label.es: Really?! Just seeing it like that makes me scared... it must have been pandemonium!
Label.zh: Really?! Just seeing it like that makes me scared... it must have been pandemonium!

Label.en: There is now a plaque on the floor remembering the event!
Label.fr: Il y a maintenant un plaque au sol pour marquer le lieu de l'évènement !
Label.es: There is now a plaque on the floor remembering the event!
Label.zh: There is now a plaque on the floor remembering the event!

Label.en: Anyway, that concludes my story on the Fontaine des Innocents!
Label.fr: Et hop, voici qui clôt mon histoire sur la fontaine des innocents !
Label.es: Anyway, that concludes my story on the Fontaine des Innocents!
Label.zh: Anyway, that concludes my story on the Fontaine des Innocents!

Label.en: Right! Just seeing it like that makes me scared... it must have been pandemonium!
Label.fr: Absolument! Le Pandémonium près de chez vous !
Label.es: Right! Just seeing it like that makes me scared... it must have been pandemonium!
Label.zh: Right! Just seeing it like that makes me scared... it must have been pandemonium!

Label.en: There is now a plaque on the floor remembering the event!
Label.fr: Il y a maintenant une plaque au sol pour marquer le lieu de l'évènement !
Label.es: There is now a plaque on the floor remembering the event!
Label.zh: There is now a plaque on the floor remembering the event!

Label.en: Anyway, that concludes my story on the Fontaine des Innocents!
Label.fr: Et hop, ainsi s'achève mon histoire sur la fontaine des innocents!
Label.es: Anyway, that concludes my story on the Fontaine des Innocents!
